title: Ruling on a traveler praying in a Masjid, do we shorten or pray full
transcript: what about if i were to go and pray in the masjid in this case you have to pray like the imam if the imam prays four raka's you have to pray for raqqa if he prays three raka's maghrib or turaka's fajr then you have to follow him if he's a traveler as well and he shortens then you should follow him by shortening
